sourcesContent: import React, { useState} from 'react' import {useParams, useNavigate} from 'react-router-dom' import {Card, ListGroup, Button, Form, Row, Col} from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from './Rating' import Category from './Category' const Food = ({food}) => { const [qty, setQty] = useState(0) const a = [1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9] const params = useParams() const navigate = useNavigate() const addToCartHandler = () => { navigate(`/cart/${params.id}?qty=${qty}`) } return ( {food.name} ${food.price} Qty setQty(e.target.value)}> {a.map((x) => ())} ) } export default Food
